name: The Bar Association of San Francisco
description: Our mission is to educate as many people as possible about their legal rights; to give as many people as possible access to affordable, competent legal representation; to study cultural trends and investigate current social and political realities, in order to identify those most in need of access to our system of justice; and to modify and expand our capabilities and services in order to accomplish the above.
